overview: Corona Apocalypse Berlin - Lonely queers cruise through Kreuzberg and Neuk√∂lln, rattle at the doors of closed-down bars and clubs and even have to flee from the police for violating SARS-CoV-2 infection protection regulations! And the shoot for the campy sex scene in a Kreuzberg parking garage was also quite exciting, as the actions did not go unnoticed by some of the inhabitants of the neighboring high-rise! The film is accompanied by Toni Karat's grim and breathless soundtrack and the latest post-punk release by R Talin!
title: Endzeit Berlin
